resources.string:
"• MySafety is an innovative discreet personal safety app for women, elderly citizens and anyone who needs assistance in an urgent situation.

"
"• After creating your account you have to add contacts of people you can trust in case of emergencies by going into the 'Add Contacts' section of the drawer menu.

"
"• You can view all your contacts saved in the 'All Contacts' section of the drawer menu.

"
"• Now, whenever in any kind of danger you just have to press the button on the home screen once and a message with your current location will be sent to all your saved contacts."
